io.sphere.client.facets.expressions

Interface FacetExpression

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicFilterHelpers.HelperFacet, FacetExpressionBase, FacetExpressions.Categories.TermsMultiSelect, FacetExpressions.DateTimeAttribute.Ranges, FacetExpressions.DateTimeAttribute.RangesMultiSelect, FacetExpressions.DateTimeAttribute.TermsMultiSelect, FacetExpressions.MoneyAttribute.Ranges, FacetExpressions.MoneyAttribute.RangesMultiSelect, FacetExpressions.MoneyAttribute.TermsMultiSelect, FacetExpressions.None, FacetExpressions.NumberAttribute.Ranges, FacetExpressions.NumberAttribute.RangesMultiSelect, FacetExpressions.NumberAttribute.TermsMultiSelect, FacetExpressions.Price.Ranges, FacetExpressions.Price.RangesMultiSelect, FacetExpressions.Price.TermsMultiSelect, FacetExpressions.StringAttribute.TermsMultiSelect, FacetExpressions.Terms

    public interface FacetExpression
    Specifies an attribute to aggregate facet counts on when fetching products, such as 'variants.attributes.color'. Note that by applying a terms, values or ranges facet, the result set itself is not restricted. To implement a typical faceting behavior, use multi-select facets.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<QueryParam> createQueryParams()
      Sphere HTTP API query parameter that this facet expression will be turned into.

    • Method Detail

      • createQueryParams

        java.util.List<QueryParam> createQueryParams()
        Sphere HTTP API query parameter that this facet expression will be turned into. Useful mostly for debugging purposes.
